name: betula
description: Betula is a minimal, plain-text-based personal bookmark manager designed to organize URLs into a tree-like structure. Focused on privacy and simplicity, itâ€™s ideal for self-hosters who prefer lightweight tooling.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Simple, lightweight text-based storage for portability. No database complexity

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution keeps bookmarks completely private. Your links, your control

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Plain text files make backing up trivial. Simple data management

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize with flexible tagging system. Find bookmarks quickly
